entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is an elf who is being questioned by Mr. Diggory about the Dark Mark.

entities.name: mr diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is a member of the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is mentioned as being similar to Winky in moments of terrified disobedience.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one observing the scene between Mr. Diggory and Winky.

relationships.description: Mr. Diggory is questioning Winky about the Dark Mark.
